image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Georgia; born in Millen, Jenkins County, Ga., on November 8, 1948; B.A., Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, Ga., 1973; M.B.A, Georgia State University, Atlanta, Ga., 1977; Ph.D., Georgia State University, Atlanta, Ga., 1987; United States Army Reserve, 1973-1981; Screven County, Ga., Commission, 1993-1998; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighth Congress (January 3, 2003-January 3, 2005); unsuccessful candidate for reelection in 2004.

creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: Burns, Max. Cottage Water Systems: An Out-Of-The City Guide to Pumps, Plumbing, Water Purification, and Privies. Cottage Life Books, 1993.
------. The Dock Manual: Designing, Building, Maintaining. Pownal, Vt: Storey Books, 1999.
